snippet: John Moore scored a power-play goal in the extra period to beat Dallas, which leads the league in points.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Dallas Stars, 3-2, in overtime; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: John Moore scored a power-play goal in the extra period to beat Dallas, which leads the league in points.

headline.print_headline: Devils Down the Stars in Overtime to Climb Into Playoff Position
headline.main: Devils Down the Stars in Overtime to Climb Into Playoff Position
